reviews.review: A good game to play and have fun with a litlle taste of toxic players
没什么好说的，很难确定制作组对胜利的评判方式，本来就脑溢血的匹配机制再加上新的改动对屠夫而言无疑是雪上加霜，会玩的几个屠夫把把八段匹配二三段四个齿轮车队，不会的屠夫挂四次就剩一台机，只能说真的就是四个人的钱比一个人好赚，别跟我扯什么隐藏分多高，故意连输七局掉的分照样匹配四齿轮，亏我最近还买个破DLC，真心不想再喜欢这个游戏

I like the addition of Ash from Ash vs Evil Dead in this game. I also like of how they have some killers that everyone knows. I wish that you could fight back the killer with weapons though. The game is tougher without weapons.
pinhead trash  trash game but fun
Don't play alone, play with friends. Very good game
A little sparse but fun. Variety would be understandably hard to balance.

Bought this game for $13 dollars on sale and it was so worth it, I can't stop playing this game except when it crashes my computer with a kernel security error but that cause my pc is half a decade old. once i had about 80 hours i bought the pyramid head dlc and stranger things once it removal got announced and some point to get a few killers and it was so worth it. buy this game if you can it is my favorite game at the moment and it is just too good.

pontos positivos:
jogar com amigos
tem uma variação razoável de mapas
ainda tem conteúdo sendo lançado
o jogo é jogável sem comprar dlc

pontos negativos:
algumas coisas pagas são roubadas, como perks de sobrevivente
alguns killers pagos são mais divertidos 
tem uma comunidade meio tóxica
as vezes tem sala mt lagada (mas da pra ver antes de iniciar)
Fun game with plenty to learn. You can take the game seriously, but not too seriously or you will start malding
i like touching children with nemis's tentacle
skill based match making turned the game from chill to sweat :(

養鬼吃人更新出來後不能玩
連接伺服器後就雪花屏重開電腦

Dead by Daylight is such a unique and exciting game! It provides a large selection of perks and characters that make every game feel different and ensures the game never feels stale. Its asymmetric design provides something for everyone: if you want to fly solo, you can; if you want to play with friends, you can. I would highly recommend this game to anyone that is interested!

This is the worst game. 12 hours later and still bad. Hey 290 something hours later still bad in all seriousness this game will make you mad do not buy it, if you have boughten it recently REFUND IT. The devs do not fix any real issues the matchmaking is horrible, a majority of the community are toxic and will do there best to make your day worse. There are other asymmetrical horror games that are fun and aren't a severe waste of time, there are other good asymmetrical games like propnight or VHS. The entire game is a GRIND, half of your time is looking for a match or being in a loading screen. This game is not fun the devs do nothing and try to cover that up by adding new outfits and tomes or a tiny amount of free bloodpoints to continue the infinite never ending grind that this horrible game is. There is a reason this game is dying it's because although it looks different nothing really changes. So like three hundred hours later or something idc it's still bad so so so bad. 800 hours later from the review still bad, maybe worse.

Ich habe noch nie so ein schlechtes ranking system in meinem ganzen Leben ich betone "LEBEN" gesehen und gespürt was die mit euch machen grenzt an versuchtem Mord ich betone "MORD" gibt das spiel zurück solange ihr könnt.
Addictive game and good thing to do when procrastinating school work ;-;
Decently balanced game since it came out. Good game to play with friends. Overall recommend, either to play with others or yourself.
Si te llegas a poner tenso con el ambiente y los asesinos, realmente pasas un buen rato y las horas se te pasan volando! Recomendado totalmente
de los mejores juegos q he visto, aunque desearía que se pudieran obtener mas pj sin tener q pagar por ellos
Игра интересная, для многих подойдет. За 90 часов игры успел взять 1 ранг убийцы и 10 ранг сурва
This game is perfect to play with friends. I deffinetly recommend it.

At this point, this game is dead to me. After playing for a long time, getting red ranks for both survivor and killer, I've decided that you should not get this game. They recently did an update to assist in skill based matchmaking. While this sounds like a good thing, it had made this game SWEATY. This is no longer the game I loved and enjoyed. Every match is a sweat fest, full of tryhards and meta builds. If you're a new player, you will get pummeled into the fog, and then shoved into the campfire. Full of  Face Campers, NOEDs, Mories, Dead Hards, DSs, etc. It's not fun anymore.

Not worth it. As for veteran players, if you're looking to get back into it, go play something like Hunt: Showdown.
This game blows now, and isn't like the Dead by Daylight we knew and loved.

If you are looking for a game that is bugged to it's core, has serious balancing issues, and has very clueless devs that don't understand what problems the game has, then you picked the right game to check out! Let's talk bugs shall we? The game is so buggy, that it gives day 1 Cyberpunk a run for its money (might not be true). The bugs can range from the add-ons not working as intended, to literally making a killer unplayable. For instance, if you play the nurse you will quickly notice that every 3 blinks your power for some reason stops working, which is very convenient because the nurse is literally slower than survivors. 

Next is the balancing. The balancing in DBD is a f*cking joke, not only is the game CRAZY survivor sided, but the 7 generators that you are supposed to patrol around and keep from being repaired can be fixed within insane speeds. When you play as the killer, you are supposed to keep the survivors from repairing 5 of the 7 generators, but you can basically take it down to 4 out of 7, because the survivors literally spawn 2 meters away from the nearest generator half the f*cking time, but also the speed that you can repair generators at even without items is absurd. Which leads me to my next point, the items. The items and add-ons that survivors can bring with them of find mid-game are BY FAR outclass the add-ons that you USUALLY bring as killer. Like the medkit, which makes you heal yourself or your teammates at retarded speeds, or the toolbox which makes the already crazy generator repair speed even faster if you used accordingly. But items are only one part of the problem, the other is the perks. The perks that survivors have are literally busted AF. If you play DBD you will quickly realise that a lot of survivors will use perks such as "Decisive strike, Borrowed time, Dead hard, Unbreakable, or Iron will". 

Last but not least the devs. The devs (the balancing team of the devs anyway) literally don't know sh*t about balancing. Not only do they not know how to balance perks, add-ons or items, which I already mentioned but they can't even get the objectives of the game balanced correctly. So let me get this straight devs, you are telling me that I have to hook each survivor in my game 3 times (4 x 3 = 12) EACH??? How the f*ck is anyone supposed to do anything even close to that??? The person that thought that was a bright idea must have been REALLY high on meth while thinking about this sh*t. If you play against a competent team that have at least 3 brain cells together and know how to fix generators, you will quickly realise that within the time that you hook a single survivor only ONCE, a generator will have popped from a kilometer away. Does 12 hooks within 5 gens sound possible to you? Because I assure you that it's not possible to do 90% of the time that you play against a competent team. This game is sh*t, please spare yourself from all the anguish of playing this game. This game literally gets off on you suffering while playing it.

I've never wanted a game to do well this badly in years.
DbD at its best is brilliant with a huge skill wall that's fun to learn and interesting mechanics you pick up through hours.

At its worst its toxic, frustrating and borderline unplayable at times with hackers and 4 man bully squads throwing baby killers around like food.

Does this mean its a bad game? No
Will some of these issues get addressed? Hopefully with this years updates.

I hope people try this game, but more so I hope the devs stick to their word.

Its a great, if not fantastic game but like 99% of competitive, Vs games out their has huge problems, if you are willing to get through those to see the brilliant parts of this game its well worth it.
Was a really good game, still is a good game. SBMM is ass

Tunnel by Daylight, si vous aimez la merde sauter le pas ! Vous aimez rester sur un crochet toute la partie car grâce au SBMM vous allez être avec des joueurs de "votre niveau" ! Venez sur DBD ce jeu incroyable !   8 Games 7 Blight, bhvr ??? Blight by Daylight

Imagine actually hearing ur heart pound out of your chest. Imagine punching your fist through your screen when you miss a skillcheck. Imagine depressing queue times when you're trying to play as the killer. If you want all that, DbD is your game.
Jk, overall a very nice game to play. Very much worth it.
this game is decent for playing casual with your friend, but please have some patience with another player in solo queue
Best asymmetrical horror game to date

ИГРА ОЧЕНЬ ХОРОШАЯ В НОВОМ ОБНОВЛЕНИИ ДОБАВИЛИ ЛЕОНА ИЗ БРАВЛ СТАРСА НУ ЭТО ИГРА ТАМ ГДЕ ДЛЯ ДЕТЕЙ ЕСТЬ БРАВЛЕРЫ И ПОДВАЛ ЕЩЕ В ПЯТЕРОЧКЕ ДОБАВИЛИ БРАВЛОВ ЭТО ТАКИЕ РЕЗИНОВЫЕ ШТУКИ ЧТОБЫ ИГРАТЬ ВООООТ ВПРИНЦИПЕ ПРИКОЛЬНО Я ОЦЕНИЛ ЕЩЕ У МЕНЯ ПОДРУГА НЕДАВНО НАШЛА ТАРУ КОТОРАЯ БРАВЛ ИЗ ПЯТЕРОЧКИ КСТАТИ У МЕНЯ В БРАВЛ СТАРСЕ УЖЕ 9000 КУБКОВ ЭТО ОЧЕНЬ КРУТО НО Я ХОЧУ ПОЛУЧИТЬ БРАВЛЕРА ЗА 10 000 КУБКОВ ЕЩЕ Я НАШЕЛ МНОГО ДРУЗЕЙ ОНИ ЛЮБЯТ ИГРАТЬ В БРАВЛ И ТОЖЕ НАКАПЛИВАЮТ БРАВЛОВ ИЗ ПЯТЕРЕЧКИ НО ЛАДНО ВЕРНЕМСЯ К САМОЙ ИГРЕ ОЧЕНЬ СТРАШНО Я ОБДРИСТАЛСЯ ПО САМЫЕ ГЛАНДЫ И СТОПЫ НО ОЧЕНЬ РАССЛАБЛЯЕТ И ИГРА ВОВСЕ НЕ СТРАШНАЯ НО ИНОГДА БЫВАЕТ СТРАШНО И ЭТО ТОЖЕ ОЧЕНЬ СТРАШНО НО ЭТО СТРАШНО МОЖНО ПРОСТИТЬ В ОБЩЕМ ЕЩЕ Я ВСПОМНИЛ ПРО ЛЕГО-НАРУТО ОЧЕНЬ ПРИКОЛНЫЕ ИГРУШКИ ТАМ НАРУТО ТАКОЙ ПРИКОЛЬНЫЙ С ЖЕЛТЫМИ ВОЛОСАМИ А РААЗ У НЕГО БЕЛЫЕ ВОЛОСЫ ТО НА ЯЙЦАХ ТОЖЕ БЕЛЫЕ ТЕ КТО ШАРЯТ ЗА НАРУТО СКАЖИТЕ В КОММЕНТАРИЯХ КОТОРЫЕ В КОММЕНТАРИЯХЪ ПОД ИГРОЙ И ЕЩЕ Я ПУКНУЛ НО ЭТО В ОБЩЕМ ТО НЕВАЖНО НАДЕЮСЬ ЭТОТ ОТЗЫВ БУДЕТ ДЛЯ ВАС ПОЛЕЗЕН НО Я ЕЩЕ НЕ ЗАКОНЧИЛ ДАВАЙТЕ ОБСУДЕМ КАК ХОРОШО ПОДТИРАТЬСЯ ВЛАЖНЫМИ САЛФЕТКАМИ И ЕЩЕ СУХОЙ ТУАЛЕТКОЙ ПРИКОЛЬНО ПОТОМ ПОДТЕРАТЬ НО ЭТО ТОЖЕ НЕВАЖНО КСТАТИ СЕГОДНЯ В ШКОЛЕ Я ПОЛУЧИЛ 5 В КОММЕНТАХ ПИШИТЕ ЕСЛИ ВЫ ТОЖЕ В ШКОЛЕ ПОЛУЧИЛИ 5 И ЕЩЕ У МЕНЯ ЕСТЬ КОЛЛЕКЦИЯ КАРТОЧЕК СТАР ВАРС НУ ПОМНИТЕ ТАКИЕ КАРТОЧКИ ИЗ МАГНИТНОЙ АКЦИИ ТАК ВОТ Я ПОЛНУЮ КОЛЛЕКЦИЮ СОБРАЛ НУ ЛАДНО УЖЕ 21 ЧАСОВ МНЕ УЖЕ ПОРА СПАТКИ ВСЕМ ПОКА ЕСЛИ ВАМ ПОНРАВИЛСЯ ДАННЫЙ ОТЗЫВ СТАВЬТЕ ЛУКАС Я БУДУ ОЧЕНЬ БЛАГОДАРЕН КСТАТИ ПОМНИТЕ РЕПЕРА МЕМА БЛАГОВАЙТА ОНА ТАКОЙ КРУТОЙ А ПОМТИТЕ ПРО МЕМ ИЗ ТИК ТОКА КАТОРЫЙ ТИПО ЛИПСИ ХА ЛИПСИ ХА ЛИПСИ ГИМИ МАНИ ХА МАМЕ НА ДОЛЛАР ЖОПА НА ЗАДНИЙ КЕШ ИЛИ КАК ТАМ НУ ВЫ ПОМНЯЛИ И ЕЩЕ ВЫ НЕ ЗАБЫЛИ ПРО МЕМ С МАЛЬЧИКОМ ТИПО ТАМ ГДЕ ОН ГОВОРИТ Я ЗАШЕЛ В ФОРТНАЙТ И У МЕНЯ НА ВСЮ ГРОМКОСТЬ ВКЛЮЧАЕТСЯ ПЕСНЯ И ОН ПОТОМ ПОДПЕВАЕТ КАРОЧЕ РЕБЯТ ВИДИМО У МЕНЯ ЕЩЕ ЕСТЬ ЧАСИК ДАВАЙТЕ Я ВАМ НАПИШУ 1000-7 ДО ТОГО ПОКА НЕ ОСТАНЕТСЯ -1 ГОТОВЫ?"1000-7"

Curti demais esse jogo. Esse lance de fugir do monstro e ficar escondido dele é muito legal. Comecei jogando pelo android e acabei comprando o jogo. Parabéns aos desenvolvedores!

хоть наиграл я мало часов в этой игре, но на протяжении 4 лет следил за ней. Что могу сказать? Ну, игра очень интересная хотя временами однообразная. Она очень сильно затягивает, и часы фармятся незаметно. Короче, очень жду и надеюсь, что разрабы не забросят игру и будут дальше выпускать на нее обновы. 
В общем, всем советую ознакомиться и поиграть, вы не пожалеете!
It's best to play with 3 friends as survivors or if you're a lone wolf then it's better to play as the killer and hunt down your prey and put them on the hook while they try to escape.
a good game to chill on

Это просто невозможно, играя за маньяка и имея бронзовый ранг тебя без конца кидает к топовым пати из 4 про. Повезет если хоть одного поймаешь. Приятного в такой игре НОЛЬ! Да ещё и каждый из этой пати обязательно напишет какой ты нуб, тунелер, кемпер и тому подобное. Будь у меня возможность я бы с радостью вернул все деньги за игру и время потраченное в этой помойке. 

Отдельно хочу упомянуть один случай за 440 часов. После очередной слитой катки пати 1 рангов начала писать в чат что это была просто отвартиетльная игра и они не почувствовали никакого напряжения и удовольствия, не забыв обозвать нубом. Но после обычного вопроса "что вы хотите от низкого ранга и зачем быть такими токсичными" они действительно извинились пригласили в голосовой канал и мы почти подружились. Единственный печальный факт этой истории в том, что это были единственные встреченные мной игроки которые поняли что действительно обидели кого-то своими коментариям.

Подводя итог я категорически не советую покупать эту игру. И сам пойду удалю её
es ist ein sehr geiles spiel weiter so
you can play as an egirl and get chocked by michael meyers, very erotic
